page.title: 14Hobbies
page.content: 1.My hobby is reading. I like reading poetry the best. I have 50 books of poems. I also like reading ghost stories. I read a ghost story every night. I read in my spare time when we are off school. The most I have read in a day is 6 books. Louise Corcoran. {2.My hobby is playing tennis. I play {whenever I can. My mum has just bought {me a new racket and a really good {ball. I intend to play more often and {book the courts. { Lisa Gallagher 3.I collect Key Rings and Rubbers. I have 114 key rings. I have fur ones, a money one, a skate boot and lots more. I have 43 rubbers. I have a coca-cola, a flag, a hot-dog and many more which I keep in a tin for safety. I have not used any of them. Karen Donaghy
